vector.name: Constructs1
vector.summary: Construct a new vector from a value to fill the components.
vector.param: The value to fill the components.

vector.name: Constructs2
vector.summary: Construct a new vector from 2 components.
vector.param: The value for the X component.
The value for the Y component.

vector.name: Constructs3
vector.summary: Construct a new vector from 3 components.
vector.param: The value for the X component.
The value for the Y component.
The value for the Z component.

vector.name: Constructs3From2
vector.summary: Construct a new vector from a 2-component value and another value.
vector.param: The value for the X and Y component.
The value for the Z component.

vector.name: Constructs3With2
vector.summary: Construct a new vector from a value and another 2-component value.
vector.param: The value for the X component.
The value for the Y and Z component.

vector.name: Subtract
vector.summary: Subtracts a vector with another vector.

vector.name: MultiplyValue
vector.summary: Multiplies a vector with another value.

vector.name: Divide
vector.summary: Divides a vector with another vector.

vector.name: DivideValue
vector.summary: Divides a vector with another value.

vector.name: Modulo
vector.summary: Modulos a vector with another vector.
